title: Rename JSON Init Parameter
objective: Learn how the JSON initialization parameters are defined and accessed by an app.

exercise.instructions:
1. Find the 'APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH' line and change:
    The parameter name from APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX
    The value from 5 to 7

1. Locate #define APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH line and change:
    CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX
    APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX
2. Locate XX(APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH,uint32) and change:
    APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX

1. Locate the CFE_SB_CreatePipe() and change CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH to CFG_APP_CMD_PIPE_MAX.

Refer to the tutorial document for instructions on how to confirm this change took affect.
